channel.title: Mountain Top Games [Iphone] Game development in progess (Jumper Dave)
channel.description:
Okay so i am currently hiring a team for a iphone app development company :) and right now we are looking for graphic designers and programmers :) and a website dev: Here is proof of development
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-snc6/250876_397986826915269_1098416441_n.jpg[/img]
So i will develop this topic as we get a team together :) haha.
Looking for:
-Spritters -Mappers -Graphic Designers -Programmers -Web dev
